name: Souleros Ball VII
description:
Myron & E Released by Stones Throw Records Presents
From thee record collections of Mike Heuser y The Homeboy Mad

SOULEROS BALL VII

Rare Oldies/Soul
Contains 2 officially licensed versions of "Baby I Love You" by Suenos (English & Spanish), 4 versions of "Make It With You" & 2 versions of "Ooh Baby Baby", LIVE recordings, Northern Soul & tear jerkers
Limited 100 press (Numbered & sealed)
24 tracks compiled from vinyl
Includes event promo 11x17 poster (Choose from 2 CD Cover Designs & Posters! Suenos or Cholas)
Includes 16 page zine containing background info about Suenos, their vinyl discography, # 1 Soulero Picks (Record Reviews) and Old School flickas!
Packed in a firme polypropylene protective sleeve 

--

THEE SBR PROMISE!

-All funds raised are not for profit! THE MONEY WE RAISE WILL GO BACK TO FINANCING OUR EVENTS, EDUCATIONAL/INTERVENTION WORKSHOPS, ASSISTING FAMILIES DURING A LOSS OR NEED & OTHER JAZZ!
-All tracks are derived from the record collections of our members and supporters. NO YOUTUBE DOWNLOADS OR RIPS FROM OTHER CD'S!
-Each 1st Press CD contains educational information about the artists, songs and record collectors featured on the CD!
-All our CD's are numbered and limited, usually no more then 100 copies!
-We keep it Firme! Rare! Old School! Q-Vo!

*Souleros Ball Revue is a Catalyst for Youth fiscally sponsored program. Catalyst for Youth is a 501 C (3) non-profit organization. This compilation is a gift given to a donor in exchange of a donation for non-profit, fundraising and educational purposes only. Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use.
